trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Jitbit Helpdesk | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Jitbit Helpdesk | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Jitbit Helpdesk with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Jitbit Helpdesk with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Jitbit Helpdesk.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Jitbit Helpdesk.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Jitbit Helpdesk tenant
trans-unit.target: A Jitbit Helpdesk tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Jitbit Helpdesk will be able to single sign into the application at your Jitbit Helpdesk company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Jitbit Helpdesk will be able to single sign into the application at your Jitbit Helpdesk company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Jitbit Helpdesk
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Jitbit Helpdesk

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Jitbit Helpdesk.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Jitbit Helpdesk.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Jitbit Helpdesk.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Jitbit Helpdesk.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Jitbit Helpdesk, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Jitbit Helpdesk, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>JitBit</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>JitBit</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Jitbit Helpdesk with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Jitbit Helpdesk with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate file.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate file.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In order to be able to configure single sign-on on your Jitbit Helpdesk tenant, you need to contact first the Jitbit Helpdesk technical support to get this feature enabled.
trans-unit.target: In order to be able to configure single sign-on on your Jitbit Helpdesk tenant, you need to contact first the Jitbit Helpdesk technical support to get this feature enabled.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Jitbit Helpdesk application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Jitbit Helpdesk application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Jitbit Helpdesk page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Jitbit Helpdesk page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the Jitbit Helpdesk Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "https://\.Jitbit.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the Jitbit Helpdesk Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "https://\.Jitbit.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure app URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure app URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Jitbit Helpdesk page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally as c:\\Jitbit Helpdesk.cer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Jitbit Helpdesk page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally as c:\\Jitbit Helpdesk.cer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Jitbit Helpdesk company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Jitbit Helpdesk company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the top, click Administration.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the top, click Administration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Administration</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Administration</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click General settings.
trans-unit.target: Click General settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users, companies and permissions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users, companies and permissions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Authentication settings configuration section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Authentication settings configuration section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Authentication settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Authentication settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Enable SAML 2.0 single sign on sign-in using Single Sign-On (SSO) with OneLogin.
trans-unit.target: Select Enable SAML 2.0 single sign on sign-in using Single Sign-On (SSO) with OneLogin.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Jitbit Helpdesk dialogue page, copy the Service Provider (SP) initiated endpoint value, and then paste it into the EndPoint URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Jitbit Helpdesk dialogue page, copy the Service Provider (SP) initiated endpoint value, and then paste it into the EndPoint URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: Create a base-64 encoded file from your downloaded certificate.
trans-unit.target: Create a base-64 encoded file from your downloaded certificate.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Open your base-64 encoded certificate, copy the content of it into your clipboard, and then paste it to the X.509 Certificate textbox
trans-unit.target: Open your base-64 encoded certificate, copy the content of it into your clipboard, and then paste it to the X.509 Certificate textbox

trans-unit.source: Click Save changes.
trans-unit.target: Click Save changes.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Jitbit Helpdesk, they must be provisioned into Jitbit Helpdesk.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Jitbit Helpdesk, they must be provisioned into Jitbit Helpdesk.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Jitbit Helpdesk, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Jitbit Helpdesk, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Jitbit Helpdesk tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Jitbit Helpdesk tenant.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click Administration.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click Administration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Administration</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Administration</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Users, companies and permissions.
trans-unit.target: Click Users, companies and permissions.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users, companies and permissions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users, companies and permissions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add user.
trans-unit.target: Click Add user.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add user</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add user</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Create section, type the data of the Azure AD account you want to provision into the following textboxes: Username, Email, First Name, Last Name
trans-unit.target: In the Create section, type the data of the Azure AD account you want to provision into the following textboxes: Username, Email, First Name, Last Name

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Create.
trans-unit.target: Click Create.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Jitbit Helpdesk user account creation tools or APIs provided by Jitbit Helpdesk to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Jitbit Helpdesk user account creation tools or APIs provided by Jitbit Helpdesk to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Jitbit Helpdesk **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Jitbit Helpdesk **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
